name: Combination Synergy Engine demo
description: An AI-powered Combination Synergy Engine that mines scientific literature for known longevity interventions and hypothesizes novel synergies. Powers an educational organoid simulator to test combinations.
prompt:
Combination Synergy Engine (LongBio + Modality-Agnostic)
INTERVENTIONS
Mine existing cases of successful synergies across literature. Create synergy scoring across drugs/devices/behaviors with MoA complementarity; propose trial-ready combinations.
